verbs.description: [V: sunset] beach man meets 12-year - old french girl after finding her message in a bottle in april a 12-year - old french girl put a message in a bottle and dropped it into the atlantic ocean while on a caribbean cruise months later hurricane florence deposited it on sunset beach in north carolina atlantic ocean blake ambre dorange n c jake wilson hurricane florence north carolina wfmy canary islands caribbean sunset beach north carolina ambre sunset beach
